column5: Just thought i would start a thread for this game. T.J. was getting upset!  I better get home from the office so I can start watching.
GO WINGS GO!    1-0    4 mins left in period 1
Go other team GO!!!  Who's the other team ?????
Disagree as we all know you will but he was playing great tonight!
Yup ...  Pens are gone.   Great run though for them.  Gotta admit that Detroit does have a great team.
